tool_description: Generates database migration scripts including DDL statements, data transfer commands, and index creation based on compatibility analysis results.

migration_approach.description: Migration approach: full_offline, incremental, or online

include_data_migration.description: Whether to include data migration scripts

error_messages: Schema not found: Invalid source_schema_id provided.
Unsupported migration approach: Use full_offline, incremental, or online.

Invalid batch size: Batch size must be between 1 and 10000.
usage: Provide source_schema_id, target_database_type, and migration_approach to generate migration scripts. Set include_data_migration and batch_size as needed.

ddl_script_lines.description: Number of DDL script lines generated

data_script_lines.description: Number of data migration script lines generated

estimated_execution_minutes.description: Estimated script execution time in minutes
